c:entry.c:title: Struts Project
c:entry.c:sourceContent:
mvn archetype:generate -B -DgroupId=com.test.mysite -DartifactId=mysite -DarchetypeGroupId=org.apache.struts -DarchetypeArtifactId=struts2-archetype-starter
// 运行 Servlet 容器 mvn -Djetty.port=9999 jetty:run

c:entry.c:title: GAE Project
c:entry.c:sourceContent:
mvn archetype:generate \ -DarchetypeGroupId=com.google.appengine.archetypes \ -DarchetypeArtifactId=appengine-skeleton-archetype \ -DgroupId=com.mycompany.myapp \ -DartifactId=myapp -Dversion=BETA2 \ -Dpackage=com.mycompany \
// 运行 app mvn clean install mvn -pl myproject-ear appengine:devserver

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <packaging>war</packaging> <version>BETA2</version> <groupId>com.test.mygaesite</groupId> <artifactId>mygaesite-war</artifactId>
<parent> <groupId>com.test.mygaesite</groupId> <artifactId>mygaesite</artifactId> <version>BETA2</version> </parent>
<properties> <appengine.target.version>1.8.7</appengine.target.version> <appengine.app.version>1</appengine.app.version> <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding> </properties>
<dependencies> <!-- Compile/runtime dependencies --> <dependency> <groupId>com.google.appengine</groupId> <artifactId>appengine-api-1.0-sdk</artifactId> <version>${appengine.target.version}</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId> <artifactId>servlet-api</artifactId> <version>2.5</version> <scope>provided</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>jstl</groupId> <artifactId>jstl</artifactId> <version>1.2</version> </dependency>
<!-- Test Dependencies --> <dependency> <groupId>com.google.appengine</groupId> <artifactId>appengine-testing</artifactId> <version>${appengine.target.version}</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.google.appengine</groupId> <artifactId>appengine-api-stubs</artifactId> <version>${appengine.target.version}</version> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <outputDirectory>target/${project.artifactId}-${project.version}/WEB-INF/classes</outputDirectory>
<plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>maven-war-plugin</artifactId> <version>2.3</version> <configuration> <archiveClasses>true</archiveClasses> <webResources> <!-- in order to interpolate version from pom into appengine-web.xml --> <resource> <directory>${basedir}/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF</directory> <filtering>true</filtering> <targetPath>WEB-INF</targetPath> </resource> </webResources> </configuration> </plugin>
<plugin> <groupId>com.google.appengine</groupId> <artifactId>appengine-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>${appengine.target.version}</version> <configuration> <port>8008</port> </configuration> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

# A default java.util.logging configuration. # (All App Engine logging is through java.util.logging by default). # # To use this configuration, copy it into your application's WEB-INF # folder and add the following to your appengine-web.xml: # # <system-properties> # <property name="java.util.logging.config.file" value="WEB-INF/logging.properties"/> # </system-properties> #
# Set the default logging level for all loggers to WARNING .level = WARNING
